msg: MAPREDUCE-4279. getClusterStatus() fails with null pointer exception when running jobs in local mode (Devaraj K via bobby)

author: davsclaus
msg: Fixed potential NPE from user forum

author: andy
msg: Cautious - dataset operations not protected against long running operations.
Do dataset operations only if enabled by "uber" mode (one servlet that analyses
incoming requests and dynamically chooses the operation).
